snippet: The Islamic State has blown up three ancient funeral towers in the city of Palmyra, Syria’s antiquities chief said.
abstract: Syrian official reports that Islamic State blew up three tombs dating from between AD 44 and 103 in Palmyra, continuing their destruction of World Heritage site while flaunting Unesco’s condemnation that such wanton acts are war crimes.
lead_paragraph: The Islamic State has blown up three ancient funeral towers in the city of Palmyra, Syria’s antiquities chief said.

headline.main: Syria: More Antiquities Destroyed by ISIS in Ancient City of Palmyra
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Syria: More Antiquities Destroyed by ISIS in Ancient City of Palmyra
